msbt.message: Helloooo, here. Oh! Is that ? What's up, gobble gob?

A trip to your campsite?! Hm! I'd love to take some time to kick back and stretch my wings out thereBut a chef's work is never over! I've got hungry customers to feed, so I'm stuck here for now.But I appreciate the invite! Next time I see you, I'll be there cooking up more delicious dishes.
